[[inst_lw]]
==== LW

*Syntax:* lw [SrcL, SrcR<{.sw,.uw}><<<shamt>], ->{t, u, Rd}

*Description:* Load 32-bit word from memory.

image::../generated/encodings/enc_lw.svg[LW encoding,width=800]
